ingredients: 1½ tbsp. poppy seeds or 6 cashew nuts
¼ cup chopped coconut or grated coconut
one and a half tbsp. oil
½ tsp shahi jeera or jeera/cumin
two large or 3 small green cardamoms
500 grams or ½ kg chicken (bone-in chicken can be used)
1 tsp garam masala (refer notes) + ¼ tsp
1 sprig curry leaves or 8 pudina/mint leaves
1 tbsp. thick yogurt/ curd (optional, refer notes)
